thread.title: AMD says no change to Co's position on susceptibility to Gpz Variant 1 or Gpz Variant 2

author: Reuters Editorial
title: AMD says no change to Co's position on susceptibility to Gpz Variant 1 or Gpz Variant 2
text:
Jan 11 (Reuters) - Advanced Micro Devices Inc:
* AMD SAYS THERE IS NO CHANGE TO AMD’S POSITION ON OUR SUSCEPTIBILITY TO GPZ VARIANT 1 OR GPZ VARIANT 2 (COLLECTIVELY CALLED SPECTRE IN NEWS REPORTS)
* AMD- SPECTRE VARIANT 2 NOT DEMONSTRATED TO WORK ON AMD PRODUCTS; OUT OF CAUTION, MAKING OPTIONAL MICRO CODE UPDATES AVAILABLE TO FURTHER CONTAIN THREAT‍​‍​ Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
